title: Design for Test and Characterization Intern
list: Worked on IBM Z Logic Built in Self Test (LBIST) characterization routines
Assisted in development of FPGA based tester platfrom with Linux drivers
Developed parallelized LBIST diagnostic routines to accelerate fault analysis
Developed machine learning methodologies for LBIST diagnostics
Developed interactive characterization dashboards for lab experiments
Developed EDA tools to identify areas for power optimization post-synthesis
